setup.title: Local setup: Hub and Core run on the same system
setup.pickPath: pick a custom Qortal installation path if your Core is installed in a non-default location.

introSetup.paragraph1: Qortal is a decentralized platform that gives you full control over your data, applications, and finances. To get started, we recommend that you install the Qortal Core, which powers the network and enables all features of Qortal.
introSetup.paragraph2: This setup wizard will guide you through installing and configuring the Qortal Core on your device. Click Next to continue with the installation.
introSetup.advanced: if you are using a remote node, please close this setup wizard and then click "Choose custom node"

recommendation.title: using your local core
recommendation.description: you may proceed with the public node if you wish, but we strongly recommend using your local node for the best experience.
recommendation.subTitle: advantages of using a local node:
recommendation.publicExplanation: The public node you connect to is actually a privately operated node that has been made publicly accessible. While convenient, it comes with certain limitations compared to running your own.
